author: felicity
msg: bug 3366: a from address of 'foo@bar...' was causing issues with Net::DNS.  1) don't bother doing an A or MX lookup on 'bar...' -- trim it to 'bar.', then notice that it's not at made up of at least 2 parts and skip.  2) in all_from_addrs, unique the list of addresses, and also deal with the 'bar...' names -- squish to 'bar.'.

author: jm
msg: a couple of things that people say should never be in legit mail
